price: Vjernici su samo braća, zato pomirite vaša dva brata i bojte se Allaha da bi vam se milost ukazala.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
